description: We shared a hot solo of Danny in the War Chest Update a few weeks ago and you guys went crazy. The emails poured in asking for more, more, more Danny. Luckily Mike was able to get him back for a second round. Things start out with Danny in the shower (one of my favorite things) and as things get heated, Danny takes us to the bedroom where he puts on one hell of a hot show. Mike (always the pervert) is right there to egg him on and talk shit to him. Mike knows how to push this boy's buttons and he does just that. By the time it's all over, Danny shoots one of the biggest, fast-flying loads I've seen in awhile. You can tell he's proud of himself and Mike makes sure to stroke his ego. We've gotta get Mike to get this guy in some action with another hottie. What do you think?
title: Danny
